content_descriptors.notes:
Because Odd Infinitum is set in space, the violence in this game mainly involves firing laser weapons at spaceships. There is one level in the entire game that contains blood.

This game does contain mature themes such as alcohol use, mental health issues, killing, and political themes. These themes are subtle and/or implied.

name: Odd Infinitum [ Demo ]
short_description: Arm yourself with a variety of tactical weapons and take to the cosmos in a boss-rush shoot-em-up inspired by SNES shooters. You are a pilot fresh from the academy, thrust into a battle to defend humanity from the darkest abominations of the Infinitum. What lurks among the stars has a plan for you…
